Reviews.Title: Elizabeth
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a while now and am still loving it. I am now a firm fan of sony ericsson;even went ahead and replaced my husbands i-phone with xperia play. The only thing that I was not happy with is that the phone did not come with a menu, only a digital copy is available. I bought the red one. feel free to buy this phone I have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Droopert McRudes
Reviews.Content: Fantastic phone, would definitely recommend to anyone, nice colour, battery life isn't too tough though, compared to my xperia play...
